ComicInfo.Summary:
She was created by the U.S. government to facilitate extraterrestrial communications. A hybrid of human and alien DNA, she was meant to be a living link bridging two worlds across the cosmos. But what she is is something far different, something the government scientists could have never predicted. And she is looking to communicate, but you don'twant to be on the receiving end.
